Class SendController

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

      • send

        public void send(@NonNull SendMode mode,
                 @NonNull java.lang.String hostname,
                 int port)
          throws java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException,
                 java.io.IOException
        Sends one or more encrypted messages to the specified host, according to the specified parameters
        Parameters:
        mode - The SendMode
        hostname - The host
        port - The port
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IO error occurred
        java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException - If a reflective operation failed (usually because an Algorithm or KeyExchange could not be instanced)
